RuleSet.GenFile:
$SqlScriptHeader$
You will find a number of script files in this directory, all of which are intended to be executed using the DB/2 LUW bash shell integration to install a $DbSchemaName$ database.
You must be logged in as the schema administrator $lower DbSchemaName$ in order to run these scripts.
Database Creation Scripts -------------------------
crdb_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Creates the id generators, tables, indexes and constraints of the database.
cridg_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Creates the database id generator objects.
crtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.ksh Creates the database tables.
cridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Creates the database table indexes.
crrel_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Creates the relationships between the tables.
$iterate SchemaTables( each dbadminnamelist_CreateTable empty empty )$ The individual table creation scripts called by crtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql.
$iterate SchemaTables( each dbadminnamelist_SchemaTableIndexes empty empty )$ The individual table index creation scripts called by cridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql.
Database Drop Scripts ---------------------
drdb_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Drops the id generators, tables, indexes and constraints of the database.
dridg_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Drops the database id generator objects.
drtbl_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Drops the database tables.
dridx_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Drops the database table indexes.
drrel_$lower DbSchemaName$.sql Drops the relationships between the tables.
